Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:44:52
Folder: CC3USDS - directors
Message Count: 3

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CC3USDS_00
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Nada Boutros <Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com>
CC: Zahra Kassim – Lakha <Zahra.Kassim-Lakha@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-02-21 16:29
Subject: RE: Directors 
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Nada,

 

Thank you for your email and apologies for the delayed response.

 

The current policy covers directors of entities in which Chalhoub Group Limited holds more than 50% ownership. Therefore, unless the ownership in the ventures exceeds 50%, the policy will not be applicable.

 

Ideally, each venture should provide Directors and Officers (D&O) liability insurance coverage for the sitting board members. However, if this is not feasible, please let me know, and I will be happy to provide any assistance required.

 

Best Regards,
Hagop

 

From: Nada Boutros <Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: 20 February 2025 7:01 PM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Zahra Kassim – Lakha <Zahra.Kassim-Lakha@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Directors 

 

Hi Hagop, 

 

Another D&O insurance question - this one slightly different. 

 

We often nominate our Chalhoub employees to sit on the boards of our portfolio companies, companies that we invest in, all over the world, including the US. These director positions are usually vacated oncr the employee is no longer at Chalhoub. 

 

Would our D&O insurance cover?

We often nominate our Chalhoub employees to sit on the boards of our portfolio companies, companies that we invest in, all over the world, including the US. These director positions are usually vacated oncr the employee is no longer at Chalhoub. 

 

Would our D&O insurance cover? 

 

Thank you!

Nada 

NADA BOUTROS​​​​

CHIEF LEGAL OFFICER

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Hi Nada, 

 

The company has communicated that they are in the process of contracting the d&o insurance. 

 

We have requested them to find an insurance covering directors who are non remunerated, non US residents or living abroad. 

 

Please, let me know if there is anything else we should point out, given there is power to influence. 

 

Best,

David
